attributes.action: Increase the time limit for sex discrimination cases to be brought to tribuneral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that the time limit for sex discrimination cases should be increased from 3 months to one year. this is to allow for circumstances such as illness / stress caused by the employer to pass or ease and allow the employee a fair trial.This would be of particular benefit to pregnant women who want to concentrate on having a healthy pregnancy and child before persuing a discrimination case.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
